lines.author: Clara
lines.text: Do you happen to know where the cakes are? I remember one of you talking about them with me.

lines.author: Girl in the black dress
lines.text: You mean these amazing cakes I haven't stopped eating since I arrived? Oh, they're right around the---

lines.author: Girl in the white dress
lines.text: Please! She has had enough! Take this one out of her hands. I beg of you!

lines.author: Girl in the white dress
lines.text: No, thank you! For helping me prevent a serious catastrophe!

lines.author: Clara
lines.text: (Poor girl... I get you, I love sweets too...)
